segments.text: You've reached Monica and Chandler's, if you're listening to this message, we're probably screening.  Yeah we are.
segments.speaker: Chandler

segments.text: Hi, this is Heldi from the Morgan Chase museum.
segments.speaker: The Museum Official

segments.text: I want to let her know that there was a cancellation and if she's still interested in having the Bing-Geller wedding at our facility, it is available
segments.speaker: The Museum Official
